meanings.definition: A card game played with a special deck of 48 cards.
meanings.sent1: We gathered around the table to play pinochle after dinner.
meanings.sent2: Grandpa taught me how to play pinochle during the summer break.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion always ends with a lively game of pinochle.
meanings.sent4: In the cozy cabin, the crackling fire accompanied our game of pinochle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shuffling cards filled the room as we started a game of pinochle.

meanings.definition: A meld of queen of spades and jack of diamonds in pinochle.
meanings.sent1: She won the round with a perfect pinochle of queen of spades and jack of diamonds.
meanings.sent2: The highest scoring move in pinochle is to make a pinochle meld.
meanings.sent3: His lucky charm seemed to always bring him the pinochle meld.
meanings.sent4: The pinochle meld gleamed in the dim light of the game room.
meanings.sent5: The opponents were surprised by her skillful play of the pinochle meld.
